verses.text: \w There|strong="H0369"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w certain|strong="H0376"\w* \w Levite|strong="H3881"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* dwelt \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w side|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* Juda:

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* \w left|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* returned \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* abode \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, willing \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* reconciled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w kindly|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, having \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w two|strong="H6776"\w* asses: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w received|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* law \w had|strong="H0001"\w* \w heard|strong="H7200"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w had|strong="H0001"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w met|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w joy|strong="H8055"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* embraced \w the|strong="H3117"\w* man. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* son \w in|strong="H3427"\w* law tarried \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* house \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H2388"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* law \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w* familiarly.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* arising \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w desired|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* depart. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* law kept \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Taste \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* little \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H6965"\w* thy stomach, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* thou shalt depart.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w down|strong="H3427"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w*. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w woman|strong="H5291"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* son \w in|strong="H3427"\w* law: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* here today, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w make|strong="H3190"\w* \w merry|strong="H3190"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w rising|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* began \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* departing. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* nevertheless \w his|strong="H7725"\w* father \w in|strong="H0376"\w* law earnestly \w pressed|strong="H6484"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w made|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w stay|strong="H3885"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Levite prepared \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w go|strong="H4994"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* journey. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* law \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0398"\w* \w again|strong="H7925"\w*: \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0559"\w* take \w a|strong="H5704"\w* little meat, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* strengthening thyself, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* farther advanced, afterwards thou mayest depart. \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w ate|strong="H0398"\w* together.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w forward|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* wife \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w*. \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* law \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w again|strong="H7925"\w*: \w Consider|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* declining, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* draweth \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* \w evening|strong="H6150"\w*: tarry \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w also|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w spend|strong="H3885"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* mirth, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* thou shalt \w depart|strong="H1980"\w*, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou mayest \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H1980"\w* thy house.

\w His|strong="H0376"\w* son \w in|strong="H0935"\w* law \w would|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consent|strong="H0014"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* words: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* forthwith \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w forward|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w over|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w another|strong="H0376"\w* name \w is|strong="H1931"\w* called \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, leading \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w two|strong="H6776"\w* asses laden, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w come|strong="H4994"\w* \w near|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jebus|strong="H2982"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H5288"\w* \w far|strong="H0413"\w* \w spent|strong="H3885"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: \w Come|strong="H4994"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* lodge \w there|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w His|strong="H0834"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w town|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w another|strong="H3808"\w* nation, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Gabaa:

\w And|strong="H5288"\w* \w when|strong="H0176"\w* \w I|strong="H0259"\w* shall \w come|strong="H7126"\w* thither, we \w will|strong="H5288"\w* lodge there, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w at|strong="H0259"\w* least \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* city \w of|strong="H4725"\w* Rama.

\w So|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* Jebus, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w their|strong="H0935"\w* \w journey|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* down \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* Gabaa, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H8033"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* lodge \w there|strong="H8033"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w*, \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w would|strong="H0376"\w* receive \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* lodge.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H0376"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, returning \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* dwelt \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* stranger \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Gabaa; \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w were|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* children \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Jemini.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* sitting \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* bundles \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: Whence comest thou? \w and|strong="H0935"\w* whither goest thou?

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H0587"\w* \w came|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* side \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w from|strong="H0376"\w* whence \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Bethlehem|strong="H1035"\w*: \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H0369"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* receive \w us|strong="H0413"\w* \w under|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* roof:

\w We|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w straw|strong="H8401"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* hay \w for|strong="H3605"\w* provender \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* asses, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* use \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w myself|strong="H3196"\w* \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*: \w we|strong="H3605"\w* \w want|strong="H4270"\w* \w nothing|strong="H0369"\w* \w but|strong="H0369"\w* lodging.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* furnish \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* necessary: \w only|strong="H7535"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* beseech thee, \w stay|strong="H3885"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w*.
